name: MILK quest (Gensun)
description:
Made this for Harold Jam 2023: Ascent of the Allies as a spiritual successor to a project I had to scrap for project scope issues. 

Features:

  • Roughly 45 minutes to 1 hour gameplay
  • Battle system featuring a morale system as a core mechanic
  • Rebels and riots, if you're into that :)
  • Default protagonists from the RPGmaker series including
    • Marsha
    • Alex
    • Lucius
    • Therese
    • Harold (of course!)
  • Innuendoes

Devlog:

Version 0.1
